name: Posts shared counter for social website
author: Selcuk kilic (Kuaza)

sections.description:
All website post link checker social network website and save shared counter..

  • Jquery ajax display
  • Auto added content before or after
  • Admin setting pages
  • Re-Generate all posts statistics
  • Basic and simple themes area. Examp: {{facebook}} shared
  • Cache enable or disable (0 query after cache)
  • Multi site functions..
  • 2 widget, greate:
    • Popular shared posts list
    • all shared counter

And more, please look here (turkish – english coming soon) http://kuaza.com/wordpress-eklentileri/wp-yazilarinizin-ne-kadar-paylasildigini-gosterin-facebooktwittergoogle-v-s

Translate Credit:

  • Turkish : Kuaza – http://kuaza.com
  • Serbian : Borisa Djuraskovic – http://www.webhostinghub.com

Sponsored

  • Author website – http://kuaza.com
  • Image upload – http://piclect.com

Translations

The plugin comes with various translations, please refer to the WordPress Codex for more information about activating the translation. If you want to help to translate the plugin to your language, please have a look at the kuaza-post-shared-tracker.pot file which contains all definitions and may be used with a gettext editor like Poedit (Windows).
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin like you always install plugins, either by uploading it via FTP or by using the “Add Plugin” function of WordPress. (Upload directory ‘kuaza-post-shared-tracker’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  4. And more please look this page: (Turkish) http://kuaza.com/wordpress-eklentileri/wp-yazilarinizin-ne-kadar-paylasildigini-gosterin-facebooktwittergoogle-v-s
  5. English document coming soon, but look all video for instal or settings..
sections.faq:
How do I add wlops button ?

v2.0 wlops out count and link button:

<!-- direkt cikis sayisi : toplam_cikis_sayisi mecburi.. --> 
<a id="toplam_cikis_sayisi" href="{{wlops_out_url}}" title="View more.." target="_blank" class="btn btn-toplampaylasim">{{wlops_out_click}} <i class="fa fa-sign-out"></i></a>

How do I change css style form?

Go to the wordpress plugins settings page and change style area.
sections.changelog:
2.3

  • Fix: multisite for settings..

2.2

  • Add new themes: Jumbo counter
  • Add new lang: Serbian (thanks Borisa Djuraskovic)

2.1

  • Empty post_publish error fix
  • add new parameters for theme: post_id (post id)
  • Show or hide options add function and loop query

2.0

  • Added wlops area for theme label
  • Added post edit page options for show or hide

1.0

  • First release (released plugins)

short_description: Automatically generate the Post (posts) social media website like and shared counter. - facebook, twitter, linkedin, google, pinterest, stumbleupon -
